lead_paragraph: A suicide car bomber rammed the gates of the restaurant, near a beach in Mogadishu, and then gunmen fought their way into the building.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Somalia: Shabab Militants Claim Attack on Restaurant
headline.main: Somalia: Shabab Militants Claim Attack on Restaurant

snippet: A suicide car bomber rammed the gates of the restaurant, near a beach in Mogadishu, and then gunmen fought their way into the building.
abstract: Somali authorities report Shabab militants have taken over Liido Seafood, Mogadishu beachside restaurant favored by government officials; attack began when suicide car bomber crashed through eatery’s gates; attack has claimed at least three lives.
